trans-unit.source: Provides the definition of a constraint-based execution context for a set of child activities.
trans-unit.target: 提供一組子活動的條件約束執行內容的定義。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The ConditionedActivityGroup activity is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, meaning the ConditionedActivityGroup activity can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]ConditionedActivityGroup 活動是<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>，這表示 ConditionedActivityGroup 活動可以包含其他活動。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>

trans-unit.source: The ConditionedActivityGroup activity runs and re-executes child activities based on the evaluation of their `when` conditions.
trans-unit.target: ConditionedActivityGroup 活動會執行，並重新執行子活動，根據評估其`when`條件。

trans-unit.source: All rules are evaluated whenever required based on their data and state change dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 每當需要根據其資料和狀態變更相依性，會評估所有規則。

trans-unit.source: When the completion rule of the ConditionedActivityGroup evaluates to `true`, it immediately cancels any currently executing child activities and finishes.
trans-unit.target: ConditionedActivityGroup 的完成規則評估為`true`，它會立即取消任何目前執行的子活動並完成。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: No children are executing and the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup.UntilCondition*> evaluates to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 無子系正在執行和<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup.UntilCondition*>評估為<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup.UntilCondition*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup"></xref>類別使用的活動名稱。

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義的活動名稱。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of times that the specified child activity has been executed.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定的子系活動已執行的次數。

trans-unit.source: The child activity.
trans-unit.target: 子活動。

trans-unit.source: The number of times that the specified child activity has been executed.
trans-unit.target: 指定的子系活動已執行次數。

trans-unit.source: child parameter is a reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: child參數是參考 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: The conditioned activity group state is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 條件式的活動群組狀態是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The number of times that the child activity has been run cannot be determined.
trans-unit.target: 無法判斷子活動已執行的次數。

trans-unit.source: Gets the currently executing instance of the child activity.
trans-unit.target: 取得子活動的目前執行的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The name of the child <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 子項目的名稱<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The currently executing instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 目前執行個體之<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: childactivity is a reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: childactivity是參考 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: The executable activities do not contain the childactivity.
trans-unit.target: 可執行活動不包含 childactivity 。

trans-unit.source: Gets the condition associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup.WhenConditionProperty"></xref> for the specified dependency object.

trans-unit.target: 活動的基礎資料存放區物件。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_when" name="when" href=""> </xref>條件。

trans-unit.source: dependencyObject is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: dependencyObject為 null 參考 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: The executable activities do not contain the dependencyObject.
trans-unit.target: 可執行活動不包含 dependencyObject 。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates when the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup"></xref> should complete.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值，指出何時<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup"></xref>應該完成。

trans-unit.source: A condition that determines whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup"></xref> should complete.
trans-unit.target: 條件，可判斷是否<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup"></xref>應該完成。
